pages.text: You frequently run out of your stamina? Let's $(strike)modify config$() make $(bold)Energy Drink$(). You can do ParCool moves without consuming stamina!

pages.title: Making Energy Drink
pages.text: Energy Drinks can be made with brewing stand.$(br2)The recipe is$(list)[Awkward Potion] + [Nether Quartz]$(list)[Poor Quality Energy Drink] + [Nether Quartz]

pages.title: Poor Quality Drink
pages.text: Poor Quality Energy Drinks is low quality version of Energy Drink. This is easy to making but have some bad effects.$(br2)The recipe is$(list)[Awkward Potion] + [Poisonous Potato]$(list)[Awkward Potion] + [Chicken]
